name: Superhero Fight Club
description:
Fight Club 2019 - Free Fighting Games

Superhero street fight club has brought a revolution to the classic street fighting games with its most furious fighting techniques of new super fighter heroes. The street fighting games are as old as the mankind history yet this super hero fight game will take you to the new world of street fighting games, where you can get the experience of best kung Fu fight between the real super heroes. Experience the classic wing Chun with amazing Kung Fu styles as well as the modern kick boxing between the most powerful super heroes of the mortal battle. Become a real combo fighter to knock out your opponents and kick them out of the fighting ring in no time with infinite fighting skills which you have learnt from karate. Show off you powerful street fighting skills in the story mode and don’t let the opponent KO you. It is time to become the real super fighter, so use the various classic combos with the new fighting techniques to win all the street fights.

SUPER FIGHTERS IN THE RING:
Acquire the horrible Kung Fu training in the new superhero fight club (pvp) to knock out the assassin and Japanese ninjas while using the mixed martial arts fighting techniques and other powerful skills. Win the brutal mortal fight while playing the story mode of this shadow fighting game and prove yourself the king of fighting. Use the close range combat technique to KO the ninja fighters and become the new kung Fu master of the superhero fight club. Join the karate martial art fight challenges on the various locations across the world while infinite fighting of street wars. Fight in the darkest jungle as well as on the Peak of Lava Mountains to knock out all the classic ninja super heroes. The kung Fu fighting games help you to develop the new fighting techniques to cope with your opponents in real time. So play this solo fighting game to get the title of champion fighter. In the past you may have played many action games but those type of free games are in very small number on the play store. Lots of top games are paid games.

KNOCK DOWN THE BEST RIVALS:
The superhero street fight club game offers you to explore the new combo fight utilizing the training mode. Join the mortal training fight to discover and invent the real challenging & unbreakable street fighting techniques to use them in the story mode. The real super heroes characters are added form the different action games to double the fun of this one on one or you can call it person vs person (pvp) fight. Knock out the villains before the times out and give the perfect KO to the opponent fighters to become real king of street wars. The super heroes fighting game is an ultimate addition to the street fighting games 2019 due to its ultra-high quality graphics and stunning fighting animations. So don’t wait any longer and download this kickboxing wrestling game to become the real street fighting champion.
 
Fight Club 2019 Features:
• Multiple new super heroes addition
• Detailed textures and stunning HD graphics
• Multiple combos with advance fighting techniques
• Most realistic moves and real stunts with flipping
• Training mode and the story mode
• High-Quality music and real fighting sounds
• Get the maximum powers and skills by knocking out all the supreme fighters
• Ultimate death fight with multiple MMA techniques

How to Play:
• Select your favorite super hero at desired location
• Use the virtual joystick to control the movements
• Tap the combo buttons to fight
• Complete the story mode to defeat the boss.

If you like the superhero fight club game, please try our all street fighting games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.

We don't collect any personal information; any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used for analytic and game improvements.
